content:
No wonder Glenn mentioned yesterday that stationery items were selling like hotcakes.
It's the first day of school!

content:
Is it the first day of school today?
With my schedule packed full of martial arts training every day,
I completely lost track...

content:
That's right! School's starting today!
As someone who technically hasn't "graduated" yet,
the "first day of school" feels both familiar and distant...
